name: Seasonal Roles
short: Assigns discord roles based on the date.
description: Assigns discord roles based on the date. Defaults to generalized/fictional (e.g. fall equinox) holidays, but can be configured to use specific holidays.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg: Thanks for intalling the Seasonal Roles cog! I hope it helps you connect with your friends.
author: zr
